placeholder.desktop: Search Novels, poems and many more…

deleteAccount.followingAreTheThingsThatWillHappen: Following are the things that will happen
deleteAccount.point1: All your data will be deleted from our servers. This includes your profile, posts, comments, and any other data you have provided us.
deleteAccount.point2: You will be logged out from all your devices.
deleteAccount.point3: You will not be able to recover your account.
deleteAccount.point4: You will not be able to access your subscription.
deleteAccount.point5: You will not be able to access your coins.
deleteAccount.point6: Your Published Poems and Novels or any other content will be deleted.

index.areYouSureYouWantToDelete: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
index.onceYouDeleteYourAccountThereIsNoGoingBa: Once you delete your account, there is no going back.
index.ifYouAreSurePleaseClickTheButtonBelow: If you are sure, please click the button below.

index.enterPassword: Please enter your new password below to update your password and get access to your account.

privacyPolicy.privacyPolicyIntro: This Privacy Policy documents the use, collection and storage of information pertaining to the use of Rachayitha website...
privacyPolicy.privacyPolicyContent: Company facilitates a User to read, listen and/or upload literary works...
privacyPolicy.privacyPolicyAgreement: This Privacy Policy is a part of and is to be read with the ‘Terms of Use’...
privacyPolicy.informationCollectionIntro: For Company to offer its Services to Users and to continuously improve...
privacyPolicy.registrationDataDetails: Name, Email Address along with profile details...
privacyPolicy.usageDataDetails: Inputs by Users on the Website/Application...
privacyPolicy.customerSupportDetails: Information provided during request for User support...
privacyPolicy.useOfInformation: What does the Company use the collected User Information for?
privacyPolicy.useOfInformationItem1: Enable and facilitate usage of the Website/Application...
privacyPolicy.useOfInformationItem2: To send mandatory and opted notifications to Users...
privacyPolicy.useOfInformationItem4: For payment and billing when a user purchases virtual currency...
privacyPolicy.useOfInformationItem5: Improve the functioning of the Website/Application...
privacyPolicy.useOfInformationItem6: Improve the User experience by customisation...
privacyPolicy.thirdPartyAccess: Can any third party access the User Information?
privacyPolicy.thirdPartyAccessIntro: Company will never sell or rent any User Information...
privacyPolicy.businessPartnersDetails: i. Analysing the User Information, for improving the Website/Application...
privacyPolicy.specialCircumstances: Special Circumstances: Company will disclose personally identifiable information...
privacyPolicy.corporateRestructuring: Corporate Restructuring: Company reserves the right to transfer User Information...
privacyPolicy.userPublishedMaterial: User Published Material: Company enables Users to interact with each other...
privacyPolicy.informationStorage: How long does Company store the User Information?
privacyPolicy.informationStorageDetails: User Information will be retained only as long as necessary for the purposes...
privacyPolicy.securityMeasures: What security measures are taken to ensure User Information?
privacyPolicy.securityAcknowledgement: Company has implemented reasonable security measures...
privacyPolicy.informationCollectionIntro: Company uses various methods to collect User Information...
privacyPolicy.mandatoryCookiesDetails: Essential for the functioning of the Website/Application...
privacyPolicy.analyticalCookiesDetails: Used for tracking and analysing the usage...
privacyPolicy.cookiesOptOut: Users can opt out of cookies through their browser settings...
privacyPolicy.userRights: What are the User Rights with respect to their Information?
privacyPolicy.registrationRights: Registration Rights: Users have the right to access their registration data...
privacyPolicy.policyChangesNotification: Company reserves the right to amend the Privacy Policy...
privacyPolicy.policyChangesAdvice: Users are advised to review the Privacy Policy periodically...
privacyPolicy.disagreement: If User disagrees with the changes, they should stop using the Services...
privacyPolicy.grievanceRedressalContact: For any grievances regarding the Privacy Policy...
privacyPolicy.conflictResolutionDescription: In case of disputes, the User agrees to submit to the jurisdiction...
